pages.text: Visit Shoeless Joe's Sports Cafe in Fort Myers, FL for great food and sports action. Open daily! Follow us on social for updates. Call 239.437.0620

Check Out What’s on Deck Welcome to a fan-favorite sports bar where the game never ends! At Shoeless Joe’s, we always have an all-star lineup year-round, from daily specials to happy hour deals and holiday highlights. Whether you’re here to cheer on your team, hang with friends and family, or…
Explore our Game Day menu with tasty options like quesadillas, buffalo chicken flatbread, and loaded salads. Perfect for your pre-game cravings!
